treebank.comment:
The present XML file has been created by Giuseppe G. A. Celano, 25 February 2015, at Leipzig University.
The text is Diodorus of Sicily in Twelve Volumes with an English Translation by C. H. Oldfather. Vol. 4-8. Cambridge, Mass.: Harvard University Press; London: William Heinemann, Ltd. 1989.
The text comes from PerseusDL:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PerseusDL/canonical/master/CTS_XML_TEI/perseus/greekLit/tlg0060/tlg001/tlg0060.tlg001.perseus-grc3.xml
The text has been automatically checked for Unicode codepoints, so that it only contains the correct letters from the Unicode Chart "Greek Extended" and Unicode Chart "Greek and Coptic" (for example, no mathematical Greek letters).
I have automatically checked punctuation: as in the original file, apostrophes are encoded as modifier letter apostrophes (U+02BC).
